Hello, I need help with developing a page-break into the new beta quote templates.

Can anyone help me with that?

I have an open community topic going on for this too:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/PDF-generation-from-quote-template-page-break/m-p/374397/highlight/false#M18854>
<@UKGV272KS> I am referring to make a template media responsive. Our email text font is not responsive. To read it on my mobileÂ I have to pinch and zoom.
Yeah, so you need to use media queries to make the template responsive for mobile. That should prevent pinch and zoom, and you can also further adjust font sizes with media queries if needed.
